trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA610_00772_SEQ_00<tab>Aedoc of Quarrymill has a culinary crisis on her hands.

TEXT_GAIUSA610_00772_SEQ_01<tab>Aedoc has exhausted her supply of Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce, and she fears an alarming drop in morale if her culinary creations are made without the savory condiment. Make for the Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy Cellars and obtain a bottle from Masher Erimmont.

TEXT_GAIUSA610_00772_SEQ_02<tab>Erimmont informs you that the next batch of Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce will finish fermenting in a short while. Whether or not it will be ready in time to save Aedoc from being devoured by famished, bean-crazed soldiers remains to be seen...

TEXT_GAIUSA610_00772_AEDOC_000_000<tab>You couldn't have come at a better time, friend. I've a crisis on my hands here! What manner of crisis, you ask? Do you see this bottle of Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce? It's <var 1A 02 /var>empty<var 1A 01 /var>, down to the last drop!

TEXT_GAIUSA610_00772_AEDOC_000_001<tab>Of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> it's a crisis! Why, if our guards find their supper wanting for flavor, they're like as not to turn their lances on me instead of our foes! Might you travel to the Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy Cellars and obtain some from Masher Erimmont to save a poor culinarian from this dire fate?

TEXT_GAIUSA610_00772_ERIMMONT_000_010<tab>Aedoc's exhausted her supply again, has she? <sigh> Told the woman time and again to order in bulk, I did, but she never listens. Hold your chocobos, friend─the next batch'll be ready afore long.
